description: Information about the cell line used in the sample

catalog_number.description: the supplier catalogue number for the cell line

catalog_url.description: the supplier catalogue url for the cell line

cell_type.description: what cell type was the line derived from, CLO ontology usually

core.description: type and schema for this object

date_established.description: when was the cell line established

derived_from.description: Which other biosample is this cell_line derived from, if available

disease.description: text describing disease association, preferable a disease found in EFO

karyotype.description: the karyotype of the cell line

name.description: what is the official name for the cell line?

passage_number.description: how many passages the cell line as been through

publication.description: what is the official name for the cell line?

cell_cycle.description: If sample is synchronized growing cells or a cell in a known phase of cell cycle, put which phase here

title: cell_line
